channel.title: dm_hydroponicz | map by Pig Popper
channel.description:
Big Pimping this around the hl2 world, enjoy, comments welcomed :slight_smile:
[url=https://files.ghost-clan.co.uk/hl2mp/maps/dm_hydroponicz.bsp.bz2][b]DOWNLOAD!![/b][/url]
[b]Play Style:[/b] Built with 3v3 in mind but shold work equally well as 1v1 The RPG is atop of a tube that constantly raises and lowers so you gotta spend some time planning when yuo're gonna access it, it also functionis as a lift ([b]it is not a lift[/b]) to the 3 levels. When someone attempts to collect the RPG the seconds it takes allows an opposing player time to reach a vantage vai an alternative route, hopefully balancing the rpg's role during play.
[b]Theme:[/b] Set in what has been described as a lost colony, possibly harvesting some unknown resource
[b]Weapons:[/b] 2x mags 3x xbow 3x shotty 2x ar2 plenty of grenades 3x orbs 3x smg nades
[b]Health: [/b] 1 x super charger 2 x suit chargers 2 x health chargers plenty of health kits and a few suit
[b]Areas:[/b] The map is comprised of 3 main play areas 1. charger area 2. RPG (lift) area 3. Garden area (+ indoor botanical garden) there is also a rather pivotal connecting setion that overlooks all 3 to some degree.
[b]Special Thanks to; [/b] Ripstar for sounds / logos and general great ideas eX for extensive playtesting boshed for being boshed shaped shoobie for his critical eye all the cats at gHOST for some killer tdm matches on this 1 and everyone at [url]hl2dm-University.com[/url], [url]snarkpit.net[/url], [url]interlopers.net[/url] and [url]fpsbanana.com[/url].
Thanks a bunch peeps.
[img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_002.jpg[/img] [img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_001.jpg[/img] [img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_003.jpg[/img]
[img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_009.jpg[/img] [img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_005.jpg[/img] [img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_006.jpg[/img] [img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_008.jpg[/img]
[img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_011.jpg[/img] [img]https://images.aworkingpig.org/maps/dm_hydroponicz/dm_hydroponicz_012.jpg[/img]

item.title: dm_hydroponicz | map by Pig Popper
item.dc:creator: Pig_Popper
item.description:
Ibanez:

Awesome! Although methinks that room with the grated wall and the… sigh… explosive barrel (4th picture) could do with some lightmaps, like in this picture.

I think I would have to change the theme in that area to achieve that crisp look, my lightmaps are at 4 or 5 in that section I’m sure.

Thanks for your comments all

item.title: dm_hydroponicz | map by Pig Popper
item.dc:creator: Pig_Popper
item.description:
Big Pimping this around the hl2 world, enjoy, comments welcomed

DOWNLOAD!!

Play Style:
Built with 3v3 in mind but shold work equally well as 1v1
The RPG is atop of a tube that constantly raises and lowers so you gotta spend some time planning when yuo’re gonna access it, it also functionis as a lift (it is not a lift) to the 3 levels. When someone attempts to collect the RPG the seconds it takes allows an opposing player time to reach a vantage vai an alternative route, hopefully balancing the rpg’s role during play.

Theme:
Set in what has been described as a lost colony, possibly harvesting some unknown resource

Weapons:
2x mags
3x xbow
3x shotty
2x ar2
plenty of grenades
3x orbs
3x smg nades

Health:
1 x super charger
2 x suit chargers
2 x health chargers
plenty of health kits and a few suit

Areas: The map is comprised of 3 main play areas

  1. charger area
  2. RPG (lift) area
  3. Garden area (+ indoor botanical garden)
    there is also a rather pivotal connecting setion that overlooks all 3 to some degree.

Special Thanks to;
Ripstar for sounds / logos and general great ideas
eX for extensive playtesting
boshed for being boshed shaped
shoobie for his critical eye
all the cats at gHOST for some killer tdm matches on this 1
and everyone at hl2dm-University.com, snarkpit.net, interlopers.net and fpsbanana.com.

Thanks a bunch peeps.







Read full topic
